about_the_game:
Welcome to the Souper Star Cafe where the secret ingredient is Magic. Pick your chef and sous chef, pick your soup, and cook with your spells to make the best soup possible.

Features

  • Physics Based Puzzle Matching, where you'll have to match ingredients in real time! Avoid your ingredients touching the bottom of the pot where they'll end up burning. Too many burned ingredients and your soup will be ruined!

  • Accumulate Curses over time and survive as long as you can while trying to attain the highest score possible.

  • Use Spells to either help save your soup or to score even higher

  • Risk and Reward Gameplay. Make and store up larger clusters of ingredients to score even more, and take extra curse cards for even higher multipliers

  • Play with Friends, either head to head in different soup pots, or cooperatively sharing the same pot with multiple cursors.

  • Multiple Characters to change the aesthetics of your chef and sous chef. With all characters sharing the same abilities, all characters are equally viable to be picked.

  • Mouse/Keyboard and Controller Support. Either use your mouse to fling ingredients, or, use a gamepad to control the cursor or to teleport between ingredients for incredibly fast movement.

short_description: Witchpop is a physics based matching puzzle game where you cook soup by juggling ingredients. Collect curses over time and try to survive as your dish becomes an increasingly chaotic mess.
